Change.Title: Symmetric Second Rank Tensor Multiply
Change.Author: Kris Zygmunt
Change.Description:
BUG: SymmetricSecondRankTensor Pre and PostMultiply return wrong type SymmetricSecondRankTensor's PreMultiply and PostMultiply methods return a tensor instead of a matrix, but multiplying a tensor by a matrix is not guaranteed to produce a symmetric tensor as a result. Thus this method has been throwing away valuable information in the lower triangle of the matrix and producing incorrect answers as a result.
The solution is to return a Matrix instead of a tensor from both methods.
